titles.title: Blessed Be The Lord God Almighty

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father In Heaven
How We Love You
We Lift Your Name
In All The Earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
May Your Kingdom Be Established
In Our Praises, As Your People Declare Your Mighty Works

verse.name: b1a
verse.lines: Who Was Is And Is And Is To Come!

verse.name: b1b
verse.lines: Blessed Be The Lord God Almighty, Who Reigns Forever More!
